hero.title: Build AI Agents with Skills
hero.subtitle: Create, evolve, and manage AI skills that power your agents

conversational.title: Conversational Creation
conversational.description: Describe what you need in plain language. Your intent is understood and everything is built automatically.

autoGenerated.title: Auto-Generated Skills
autoGenerated.description: Skills are created on the fly as your agent needs them. Reuse across agents, share via export, version everything.

evolution.title: Continuous Evolution
evolution.description: Skills improve from every execution, detecting issues and refining workflows on their own. The more you use, the better they get.

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.description: One-click full backup of skills, agents, traces, and configs. Instant restore with automatic pre-restore snapshots for safety.

skills.title: Skills Library
skills.description: Browse and manage your collection of AI skills

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.step1: Create a skill or import existing ones
quickStart.step2: Configure an agent with your skills
quickStart.step3: Run your agent and monitor results
